setting.msg-restart-required: Changing this option requires a restart to take effect.

editor.name: Penyuntingan
editor.option-spellcheck-description: Pasang penyemak ejaan. Sekarang hanya menyokong bahasa Inggeris (US).
editor.spellcheck-languages-description: Choose the languages for the spellchecker to use.
editor.spellcheck-languages-mac-description: The native spellchecker will automatically detect the language being used for you on macOS.
editor.option-show-inline-title-description: Displays the filename as an editable title inline with the file contents.
editor.option-readable-line-description: Hadkan panjang baris maksima. Ia mengurangkan jumlah isi pada skrin, tapi perenggan panjang jadi lebih mudah dibaca.
editor.option-strict-line-break-description: Dalam mod pralihat, abaikan pemenggalan baris tunggal yang menepati spesifikasi Markdown. Padam ciri ini untuk tunjukkan pemenggalan baris tunggal dalam pralihat.
editor.option-properties-in-document-descriptio: Choose how properties are displayed within the editor. Select "source" to have the properties displayed as YAML.
editor.option-auto-pair-brackets-description: Kurungan dan pemetik kata dimunculkan secara automatik.
editor.option-auto-pair-markdown-description: Simbol untuk kata tebal, kata condong, kata tumpu, palang kata, dan kod.
editor.option-smart-indent-lists-description: Uruskan inden dan penanda senarai secara automatik.
editor.option-fold-indent-description: Membolehkan isi-isi bawah inden yang sama dilipat, seperti dalam senarai.
editor.option-default-new-tab-view-description: The default view that a new Markdown tab gets opened in.
editor.option-open-tab-in-foreground-descriptio: When you open a link in a new tab, switch to it immediately.
editor.option-default-editing-mode-description: The default editing mode a new tab will start with.
editor.option-show-line-number-description: Nombor setiap baris akan ditunjukkan di sisi tetingkap.
editor.option-indentation-guide-description: Show vertical relationship lines between bullet points for visual guidance.
editor.option-use-tabs-description: Menghasilkan inden baris menggunakan kekunci "Tab". Padamkannya jika mahu guna kekunci jarak.
editor.option-tab-size-description: Satu kekunci Tab bersamaan berapa jarak.
editor.option-rtl-description: Sets the text direction of notes to display in right-to-left.
editor.option-auto-convert-html-description: Menukarkan format HTML menjadi Markdown apabila menampal atau ditarik dari laman web. Gunakan Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+V untuk menampal tanpa penukaran.
editor.option-vim-key-bindings-description: Membolehkan anda menggunakan papan kekunci Vim dalam mod suntingan.
editor.option-vim-key-bindings-mobile: On mobile devices, this setting is per-device and is not synchronized through the config file.
editor.option-reindex-vault-description: Rebuilding the cache could take a few seconds to a few minutes depending on the size of your vault.
editor.label-vim-warning: Mod Vim melancarkan penyuntingan teks tetapi agak mencabar untuk difahami. Jika anda tidak biasa dengan Vim, mod ini akan kelihatan seperti Obsidian sudah tidak lagi berfungsi.
editor.label-vim-test: Untuk mengesahkan kefahaman Vim anda, letakkan arahan untuk keluar Vim tanpa simpan fail di bawah:
editor.msg-vim-mode-enabled: Arahan adalah tepat. Mod Vim telah dipasangkan.
editor.msg-vim-mode-not-enabled: Arahan adalah salah. Mod Vim tidak dipasangkan demi maslahat anda.
editor.msg-vim-mode-please-enter-command: Diminta letakkan arahan tersebut untuk masuk mod Vim

file.name: Fail & Pautan
file.option-confirm-file-deletion-description: Pilih sama ada ingin diminta mengesahkan penghapusan fail.
file.option-delete-destination-description: Apa yang perlu dilakukan dengan fail yang dihapuskan.
file.option-always-update-links-description: Pilih sama ada pautan dalaman ingin dikemas kini secara automatik ataupun minta pengesahan setiap kali.
file.option-new-note-location-description: Pilih tempat letak nota yang baru dibuat. Tetapan plugin akan ambil alih tetapan ini jika ada.
file.option-choice-current-folder: Folder yang sama dengan nota yang dipaparkan
file.option-choice-specified-folder: Dalam folder yang ditetapkan di bawah
file.option-new-file-folder-path-description: Nota yang baru dibuat akan muncul dalam folder ini. Tetapan plugin akan ambil alih tetapan ini jika ada.
file.option-use-wiki-links-description: Menghasilkan pautan gaya wiki untuk [[pautan]] dan ![[gambar]] dan bukan pautan serta gambar gaya piawaian Markdown. Tutup pilihan ini untuk jika mahukan pautan gaya Markdown.
file.option-show-unsupported-files-descriptio: Tunjukkan semua jenis fail walaupun fail tersebut tidak disokong oleh Obsidian teras supaya boleh dipautkan dan boleh dilihat dalam peneroka fail dan penukaran pantas.
file.option-link-autocompleted-format-descrip: Tentukan rupa pautan yang dihasilkan secara automatik
file.option-new-attachment-location-descripti: Pilih tempat letak lampiran yang baru dibuat.
file.option-choice-subdirectory: Dalam subfolder dalam folder yang aktif
file.option-attachment-folder-path-descriptio: Semua lampiran baharu akan diletakkan di sini iaitu gambar atau rakaman audio yang dihasilkan sama ada melalui tarik masuk ataupun melalui salin dan tampal.
file.option-attachment-subfolder-path-descrip: Jika fail sekarang ini ialah "akar peti/folder", lalu subfolder ini dinamakan "lampiran", maka lampiran-lampiran akan diletakkan dalam folder "akar peti/folder/lampiran".
file.option-excluded-files-desc: Excluded files will be hidden in Search, Graph View, and Unlinked Mentions, less noticeable in Quick Switcher and link suggestions.
file.label-no-excluded-filters-applied: No excluded filter is applied right now. Add one below.
file.label-excluded-filters-applied: Files matching the following filters are currently excluded:
file.option-uri-callbacks-desc: Enable the use of x-callback-url through x-success or x-error when handling Obsidian URIs.

appearance.name: Penampilan
appearance.option-accent-color-description: Choose the accent color used throughout the app.
appearance.option-interface-font-description: Set base font for all of Obsidian.
appearance.option-zoom-level-description: Controls the overall zoom level of the app.
appearance.option-text-font-description: Set font for editing and reading views.
appearance.option-monospace-font-description: Set font for places like code blocks and frontmatter.
appearance.label-multiple-fonts-currently-in-effect: The following fonts are currently applied:
appearance.label-no-custom-font-set: No custom font is applied right now. Add one below.
appearance.label-font-applied: The first font from this list that is available on your system will be applied.
appearance.msg-font-not-found: This font is not detected on your system.
appearance.msg-font-found: This font is detected on your system.
appearance.option-community-themes-description: Pralihat dan gunakan tema-tema mengagumkan yang dihasilkan oleh komuniti.
appearance.option-font-size-description: Saiz huruf dalam ukuran piksel yang akan mempengaruhi mod suntingan dan pralihat.
appearance.option-font-size-action-description: Ubah saiz huruf menggunakan CTRL + Tatal atau gunakan kawalan zum pada pad sesentuh.
appearance.option-manage-themes-description: Manage installed themes and browse community themes.
appearance.option-native-menus-desc: Menus throughout the app will match the operating system. They will not be affected by your theme.
appearance.msg-reloaded-themes: Tema CSS sendiri sudah dimuatkan semula.
appearance.label-no-css-snippets-found: Tiada snippet CSS dijumpai dalam folder snippet.
appearance.option-frame-description: Determines the styling of the title bar of Obsidian windows. Requires a full restart to take effect.
appearance.option-custom-icon-desc: Set a custom icon for the app
appearance.option-configure-ribbon-desc: Configure what commands appear in the ribbon menu in the navigation bar.
appearance.option-mobile-quick-ribbon-item-desc: Tapping on the ribbon item in the navigation menu will activate this ribbon item. Tap and hold will still show the menu.
appearance.option-show-ribbon-desc: Display vertical toolbar on the side of the window.
appearance.label-modal-configuration-desc: Choose what items you want to be active in the ribbon. Drag and drop to change the order.
appearance.option-show-view-header-desc: Display the header at the top of every tab.

hotkeys.name: Kekunci Pintasan
hotkeys.tooltip-hotkey-multiple-conflicts: Kekunci pintasan ini bercangan dengan {{count}} arahan lain

about.name: Perisian
about.label-manual-update-required: To support the latest features and to receive the latest security patches, Obsidian needs a major installer update. You need to manually download and reinstall Obsidian.
about.option-auto-update-description: Tutup pilihan ini jika tidak ingin aplikasi menyemak kemas kini.
about.option-check-slow-startup: Notify if startup takes longer than expected
about.option-check-slow-startup-description: Diagnose issues with your app by seeing what is causing the app to load slowly.
about.option-insider-build-description: Mendapatkan kemas kini daripada versi insider untuk menguji ciri-ciri baharu. Ambil maklum bahawa versi ini adalah yang paling terkehadapan dan mungkin kurang stabil.
about.option-hw-acceleration-description: Menghidupkan ciri pemecutan perkakas yang menggunakan GPU untuk melancarkan Obsidian.
about.option-hw-acceleration-warning: Jika pilihan ini ditutup, prestasi aplikasi akan merosot dengan banyak.
about.option-config-location-description: Pilih folder konfigurasi selain yang ditetapkan. Nama folder perlu bermula dengan titik.
about.option-config-location-warning: Tempat letak konfigurasi mestilah menggunakan nama folder yang sah serta bermula dengan titik.
about.label-commercial-license-info: Didaftarkan bawah nama "{{company}}" untuk {{seats}} orang pengguna. Sah sehingga {{expiry}}.
about.option-catalyst-desc: You currently have the {{tier}} Catalyst license. Thanks for your support!
about.option-catalyst-desc-no-license: You don't have a Catalyst license right now. Catalyst license is a one-time donation to support Obsidian development.
about.label-add-own-language: See how to add your language to Obsidian.

account.name: Akaun
account.option-your-account-desc-no-login: You're not logged in right now. An account is only needed for Obsidian Sync, Obsidian Publish, and Catalyst insider builds.
account.option-commercial-license-desc: If you use Obsidian for commercial purposes, you may need to get a commercial license.
account.message-empty-password: Kata laluan tidak boleh dibiarkan kosong.
account.message-login-failed: Gagal mendaftar masuk, pastikan emel dan kata laluan adalah betul.
account.mfa-wrong-format: The 2FA authenticator code must be 6 digits.
account.mfa-verification-failed: 2FA code is incorrect, please double check your authenticator app.

core-plugin.option-search-plugin-description: Filter plugins by name or description.

third-party-plugin.name: Plugin pihak ketiga
third-party-plugin.option-restricted-mode-description: Restricted mode is off. Turn on to disable community plugins.
third-party-plugin.option-browse-community-plugins-descript: Gelintar dan pasang plugin pihak ketiga yang dihasilkan oleh komuniti kami yang hebat-hebat belaka.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-1: Community plugins, like any other software you install, could potentially cause data integrity and security issues.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-2: Plugin security is important to us. Here's what we do:
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-3: Despite our efforts, there is still a small chance that a community plugin might misbehave.
third-party-plugin.label-code-review-desc: Plugins undergo an initial code review by our team before they appear in the store.
third-party-plugin.label-open-source-desc: Most plugins are open source on GitHub, so you can inspect the code yourself.
third-party-plugin.label-peer-audit-desc: We have a large community of developers who watch out for each other.
third-party-plugin.label-report-mechanism-desc: We follow up and remove faulty plugins upon user report.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-disable-confi: Would you like to exit Restricted Mode to enable community plugins? We strongly recommend making backups of your data before doing so.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author: Do you trust the author of this vault?
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-1: You're opening this vault for the first time, and it comes with some plugins.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-2: If you obtained this vault from someone else, please note that plugins of unknown origin might pose security risks.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-3: If you do not fully trust the author of this vault, we recommend staying in Restricted Mode, so the plugins in this vault do not run.
third-party-plugin.label-no-recent-files-found: No recent files found. Type to search...
third-party-plugin.label-unsupported: Plugin ini tidak menyokong peranti anda.
third-party-plugin.label-no-readme: Plugin ini tidak menyediakan fail README.
third-party-plugin.msg-reloaded-third-party-plugins: Sudah memuat semula plugin pihak ketiga.
third-party-plugin.label-uninstall-plugin-confirmation: Adakah anda yakin ingin membuang plugin ini? Perbuatan ini akan memadam folder yang menempatkan plugin ini.
third-party-plugin.label-currently-installed: Sekarang ini ada {{count}} plugin yang dipasang.
third-party-plugin.label-currently-installed_plural: Sekarang ini ada {{count}} plugin yang dipasang.
third-party-plugin.msg-no-updates-found: Tiada kemas kini plugin yang dijumpai.
third-party-plugin.msg-updates-found: Terdapat {{count}} plugin yang ada kemas kini.
third-party-plugin.msg-updates-found_plural: Terdapat {{count}} plugin yang ada kemas kini.
third-party-plugin.option-search-installed-plugin-descripti: Tapis plugin yang dipasang mengikut nama atau keterangan.
third-party-plugin.label-donate-modal-text1: Plugin developers are community volunteers who make amazing things out of passion. If you find this plugin useful, please consider funding its development.
third-party-plugin.label-donate-modal-text2: 100% of your contribution will go to the plugin developer; Obsidian does not take a cut. The funding platform they choose might charge a fee.

mobile-toolbar.name: Jalur alat untuk peranti mudah alih
mobile-toolbar.option-configure-quick-action: Tetapan untuk Tindakan Pantas mudah alih
mobile-toolbar.option-configure-quick-action-descriptio: Tetapkan arahan apa yang ingin dilaksanakan ketika skrin dileret dari atas ke bawah. Arahan yang sekarang ialah "{{command}}".
mobile-toolbar.option-configure-toolbar: Tetapan untuk jalur alat mudah alih
mobile-toolbar.option-add-command-description: Pilih arahan global untuk ditambahkan ke jalur alat.

print-modal.title: Eksport ke PDF
print-modal.caption: Eksport "{{filename}}" ke PDF dengan tetapan berikut.

interface.empty-sidebar: Papan sisi adalah kosong, cuba tarik masuk satu tetingkap ke sini.
interface.msg-plugin-error: Plugin “{{plugin}}” encountered an error while loading
interface.msg-file-changed: "{{file}}" telah diubah suai di luar, sedang menyepadukan perubahan secara automatik.
interface.msg-switched-to-read: Switched default view mode to reading view.
interface.msg-switched-to-edit: Sudah tetapkan penyuntingan sebagai mod pertama.
interface.msg-upgrade-installer: Jika mahu gunakan ciri ini, sila pasang semula aplikasi menggunakan pemasang terkini daripada laman kami.
interface.msg-desktop-only-feature: This feature is only available in the desktop app.
interface.msg-indexing:
Obsidian sedang mengindeks nota-nota...
Perkara ini sepatutnya dilakukan sekali sahaja.
Beberapa fungsi mungkin tidak ada buat seketika sehinggalah pengindeksan selesai.
interface.msg-sandbox-vault:
This is a sandbox vault.
Changes you make in this vault will be lost.
interface.msg-indexed-db-not-supported: IndexedDB is required for this feature, but it is currently disabled.
interface.msg-indexed-db-i-o-s: If you are using iOS in Lockdown Mode, please exclude Obsidian from the "Configure Web Browsing" setting of Lockdown Mode.
interface.msg-tab-busy: This tab is currently busy, please try again later

empty-state.unknown-pane-desc: The plugin that created this view ({{type}}) has gone away

menu.edit-view: Sunting (Ctrl/Cmd+Click untuk sunting di tetingkap baharu)

tooltip.not-created-yet: Not created yet, select to create

start-screen.option-open-folder-as-vault-description: Pilih salah satu folder sedia ada yang mengandungi fail-fail Markdown.
start-screen.option-create-vault-description: Buat satu folder baharu sebagai Peti Nota untuk Obsidian.
start-screen.option-connect-obsidian-sync-description: Set up a synced vault with existing remote vault.
start-screen.option-new-vault-name-description: Pilih nama untuk Peti Nota anda yang gempak.
start-screen.option-new-vault-location-description: Pilih tempat untuk meletakkan Peti Nota.
start-screen.label-new-vault-location-preview: Your new vault will be placed in:
start-screen.msg-error-rename-exists: There is already a vault with this name.
start-screen.msg-error-nested: Cannot move vault into a subfolder of itself.
start-screen.msg-error-rename-open: Can't rename a currently open vault.
start-screen.msg-error-move-exists: There is already a vault at the destination.
start-screen.msg-error-move-open: Can't move a currently open vault.
start-screen.msg-empty-vault-name: Nama Peti Nota tidak boleh kosong.
start-screen.msg-trailing-dot-vault-name: Vault name cannot end with a dot.
start-screen.msg-failed-to-create-vault-at-location: Peti Nota gagal dibuat di tempat yang diberikan. Diminta semak semula tempat dan keizinan.
start-screen.msg-error-remove-current-open-vault: Peti Nota yang sedang digunakan tidak boleh dibuang.
start-screen.option-connect-vault-desc: Create a synced vault on this device.
start-screen.tooltip-own-vault: This is a remote vault owned by you.
start-screen.tooltip-shared-vault: This is a remote vault shared with you.

mobile.label-start-screen-desc:
Obsidian stores notes on your device, so you can access them quickly and privately, even offline.
Your data is stored in a secure local folder called a **vault**.
mobile.label-sync-intro: To access your notes on other devices you need to set up sync.
mobile.label-sync-intro-desc:
Because Obsidian stores your notes on your devices, you'll need to set up sync if you want to access your notes on another phone or computer.
You can set up sync now, or just start writing and set it up later.
mobile.label-vault-create: Choose a name for your vault.
mobile.label-vault-create-desc: You can always change this later.
mobile.label-sync-setup-desc: Create a synced vault on your Obsidian account so that you can access your data from other devices.
mobile.label-remote-vault-create-desc:
End-to-end encryption ensures that your data is only accessible to you.
Choose your own encryption password, or allow Obsidian to securely manage the encryption password for you.
mobile.label-sync-settings-desc: Do you want to exclude any folders or files when syncing to this device?
mobile.label-sign-in-or-sign-up: Create an Obsidian account or sign in
mobile.label-remote-vault-options-desc: Do you want to create a new vault or connect to an existing synced vault?
mobile.label-vault-location-help: Pick a folder to put your new vault.
mobile.label-vault-location-desc: Your new vault will be placed in {{vaultLocation}}
mobile.label-region-selection-help: Choose a server region near you to make syncing faster.
mobile.label-encryption-key-help: This password cannot be changed later. If you forget your password, any remote data on Sync servers will be inaccessible forever.
mobile.label-remote-vault-selection-desc: Your account **{{email}}** has existing vaults you can connect to.
mobile.label-sign-in: Sign in to your Obsidian account
mobile.label-sync-method-selection: Choose how to sync your notes
mobile.label-sync-method-selection-desc: To use Obsidian on your devices you will need to sync your data.
mobile.label-sync-pro1: Seamless across every device and OS.
mobile.label-sync-pro2: Secured with the strongest end-to-end encryption standard.
mobile.label-sync-other-desc:
Obsidian officially supports two syncing methods: **Obsidian Sync** and **iCloud**.
However, because Obsidian gives you control over your data there are other sync options you can use.
These options include third-party plugins and other tools which may require more advanced set up.
To use an alternate syncing method, **create a vault** and follow the instructions provided by the plugin or third-party sync provider.
mobile.label-email-entry-desc: Your email is required to create an Obsidian account.
mobile.email-verification-desc: You should receive an email shortly to **{{email}}** with instructions to connect to Obsidian Sync.
mobile.icloud-missing-desc: Your iCloud vault was not detected. This could be due to any of the following reasons:
mobile.icloud-missing-reason1: Your vault is on a different iCloud account than the one you are currently signed into on this device.
mobile.icloud-missing-reason2: Your vault is not stored on the top-level Obsidian folder of your iCloud Drive.
mobile.i-cloud-unsupported-desc: iCloud syncing is only available on Apple devices. If your vault is currently syncing via iCloud, learn how to migrate your vault to a different sync service.
mobile.msg-invalid-vault: Vault location must be a folder.

starter-content.welcome-file-content:
This is your new *vault*.

Make a note of something, [[create a link]], or try [the Importer](https://help.obsidian.md/Plugins/Importer)!

When you're ready, delete this note and make the vault your own.

start-up.msg-plugin-hang: Plugin “{{plugin}}” is taking long to load.

help-screen.label-official-help-site-desc: Read the official help documentation of Obsidian, available in multiple languages.
help-screen.label-discord-chat-desc: Discord is the best place to chat with other experienced Obsidian users from around the world.
help-screen.label-forum-desc: Help each other, post feature requests, report bugs, and have in-depth discussions about knowledge management.
help-screen.label-sandbox-vault-desc: Play around and experiment with various features. Please note your changes will not be saved.

commands.open-cursor-link-to-the-right: Open link under cursor to the right
commands.open-cursor-link-in-new-window: Open link under cursor in new window
commands.navigate-tab-left: Focus on tab group to the left
commands.navigate-tab-right: Focus on tab group to the right

commands.toggle-fold-properties: Toggle fold properties in current file
commands.unfold-all: Buka lipatan semua pengepala dan senarai
commands.toggle-bold: Silih ganti tulisan tebal yang dipilih
commands.toggle-italics: Silih ganti tulisan miring yang dipilih
commands.toggle-highlight: Silih ganti tulisan tumpu yang dipilih
commands.toggle-comments: Silih ganti format komen yang dipilih

commands.open-in-new-window: Open current tab in new window

dialogue.label-link-affected: Ini akan memberi kesan kepada {{links}} dalam {{files}}.
dialogue.label-confirm-update-link-to-file: Adakah anda ingin mengemas kini pautan dalaman yang memaut ke fail ini?
dialogue.label-move-to-system-trash: Ia akan dipindahkan ke tong sampah sistem anda.
dialogue.label-move-to-vault-trash: Ia akan dipindahkan ke tong sampah Obsidian, yang terletak pada folder tersembunyi ".trash" dalam Peti Nota anda.
dialogue.label-delete-folder-warning: Jika anda meneruskan, semua fail di dalam folder ini akan dihapuskan.
dialogue.label-existing-backlink_plural: There are currently {{links}} pointing to this note.
dialogue.label-no-attachments: There are no external attachments in this note.
dialogue.msg-file-or-folder-not-found: The file or folder “{{path}}” does not exist.
dialogue.msg-block-id-invalid: Block ID can only contain alphanumeric characters or dash

file-explorer.name: Peneroka fail
file-explorer.desc: Lihat semua fail dalam peti nota anda.
file-explorer.action-create-note-in-current-tab: Create new note in current tab
file-explorer.action-reveal-active-file: Tunjukkan fail terkini di peneroka fail
file-explorer.command-make-a-copy: Make a copy of the current file
file-explorer.label-sort-new-to-old: Pengisihan mengikut waktu suntingan (baharu ke lama)
file-explorer.label-sort-old-to-new: Pengisihan mengikut waktu suntingan (baharu ke lama)
file-explorer.msg-invalid-characters: Nama fail tidak boleh mengandungi mana-mana aksara berikut:
file-explorer.msg-unsafe-characters: Pautan tidak akan berfungsi dengan nama yang mengandungi aksara berikut:
file-explorer.msg-file-already-exists: Sudah ada fail dengan nama yang sama
file-explorer.msg-bad-dotfile: File name must not start with a dot.
file-explorer.msg-set-attachment-folder: Lampiran akan disimpan di "{{path}}" mulai sekarang.

search.name: Carian
search.desc: Cari kata kunci di semua nota.
search.label-match-case: Padankan huruf besar atau kecil dengan tepat
search.label-case-sensitive: Menepati carian huruf besar atau kecil
search.label-case-insensitive: Mengabaikan ketepatan huruf besar atau kecil
search.option-show-path-description: Tunjukkan laluan penuh ke fail berbanding hanya nama fail.
search.option-link-style-description: Pilih sama ada mahu menukarkan setiap hasil fail menjadi pautan.
search.option-list-prefix-description: Pilih sama ada mahu mengimbuhkan item senarai pada setiap hasil fail.
search.label-line-option-description: cari kata kunci dalam barisan yang sama
search.label-section-option-description: cari kata kunci bawah pengepala yang sama

quick-switcher.name: Penukaran pantas
quick-switcher.desc: Tukar ke fail lain tanpa meninggalkan papan kekunci. Gunakan Ctrl/Cmd+O untuk aktifkan.
quick-switcher.label-no-note-create-new: Tiada nota dijumpai. Tekan Enter untuk wujudkan yang baharu.
quick-switcher.prompt-type-file-name: Taip fail yang ingin dibuka atau diwujudkan...
quick-switcher.tooltip-not-created-yet: Not created yet, select to create
quick-switcher.option-show-existing-only-description: Only show results from existing files. Links to files that are not yet created will be hidden.
quick-switcher.option-show-attachments-desc: Show attachment files like images, videos, and PDFs.
quick-switcher.option-show-all-file-types-desc: Show all files including ones that Obsidian can't open. The file will be opened with the default app for that file type.

graph-view.name: Paparan graf
graph-view.desc: Lihat graf yang menggambarkan pautan antara nota.
graph-view.option-depth-description: Tunjukkan nota yang dihubungkan sedalam jumlah pautan ini
graph-view.option-show-tags-description: Tag dipautkan dengan fail yang menyebut tag tersebut
graph-view.option-show-attachments-description: Tunjukkan lampiran yang dimasukkan dalam fail
graph-view.option-show-existing-files-only-descript: Kalau ya, maka fail yang tidak wujud tidak ditunjukkan
graph-view.option-show-orphans-description: Tunjukkan nota yang tidak dipautkan oleh mana-mana fail lain
graph-view.option-show-arrows-description: Tunjukkan anak panah apabila dizum masuk
graph-view.msg-screenshot-copied: Tangkap layar sudah disalin ke papan klip.
graph-view.tooltip-click-to-change-drag-to-reorder:
Tekan untuk ubah warna
Tarik untuk ubah susunan
graph-view.action-timelapse: Mulakan animasi susur masa perkembangan peti

backlinks.name: Pautan balik
backlinks.desc: Tunjukkan jumlah pautan balik dalam jalur status.
backlinks.action-open-for-current: Buka pautan balik untuk fail ini
backlinks.label-no-unlinked-mentions: Tiada sebutan tidak dipautkan yang dijumpai.
backlinks.option-backlink-in-document-desc: Show backlinks in document by default when opening new tabs.

outgoing-links.name: Outgoing Links
outgoing-links.desc: Show outgoing links and detect unlinked mentions of other notes in the current note.
outgoing-links.action-open-for-current: Open outgoing links for the current file

tag-pane.name: Tetingkap Tag
tag-pane.desc: Tunjukkan semua tag yang ada serta jumpa kemunculannya.

properties.name: Properties view
properties.desc: Show the metadata for your files.
properties.msg-merge-properties-warning-desc: In case of conflicts, the values will be merged or the value from “{{oldKey}}” will be used.

page-preview.name: Pratonton pautan
page-preview.desc: Tunjukkan nota yang dipautkan apabila penunjuk dihalakan atas pautan. Kalau dalam mod suntingan, Ctrl/Cmd + halakan penunjuk.
page-preview.label-missing-footote: Footnote {{id}} not found. Click to create.
page-preview.label-require-mod: Perlu tekan {{key}} untuk aktifkan ciri pratontonan pautan

bookmarks.name: Bookmarks
bookmarks.desc: Bookmark frequently used files and searches.

custom-css.name: CSS Sendiri
custom-css.desc: Menghiasi peti ini dengan CSS yang ditulis sendiri dalam "obsidian.css".
custom-css.label-no-readme: This theme did not provide a README file.
custom-css.msg-load-error: Tidak boleh mendapatkan data tema. Mungkin internet anda bermasalah.

command-palette.name: Palet arahan
command-palette.desc: Taipkan arahan untuk laksanakannya dengan pantas tanpa mengingati pintasan.
command-palette.option-add-new-pin-description: Arahan tersemat akan diutamakan di tempat paling atas sewaktu tiada apa yang ditaipkan.

markdown-format-importer.name: Pengimport format Markdown
markdown-format-importer.desc: Tukar fail Markdown dari aplikasi lain menjadi format Markdown Obsidian.
markdown-format-importer.zettelkasten-link-fixer-description: Membaiki pautan "[[UID]]" menjadi pautan dengan nama penuh "[[UID Nama Fail]]".
markdown-format-importer.zettelkasten-link-beautifier-description: Membaiki pautan "[[UID]]" dan perkemaskannya menjadi "[[UID File Name|File Name]]".
markdown-format-importer.msg-all-files-warning: Peringatan: Pengimport akan mengubah format semua fail dalam peti anda, bukan untuk fail yang terbuka sahaja.
markdown-format-importer.msg-override-files-warning: Fail-fail anda akan dipaksa ubah. Dinasihatkan agar semua fail disandarkan sebelum cuba mengubah format.

daily-notes.name: Nota harian
daily-notes.desc: Buka hari ini punya nota harian, atau wujudkan kalau tiada.
daily-notes.msg-fail-format: Gagal mewujudkan nota harian. "{{format}}" bukanlah format yang sah.
daily-notes.msg-fail-folder: Gagal mewujudkan nota harian. Folder "{{folderOption}}" tidak dijumpai.
daily-notes.msg-fail-template-file: Gagal mewujudkan nota harian. Fail templat "{{template}}" tidak dijumpai.
daily-notes.msg-no-previous: Tiada nota harian untuk hari sebelum ini.
daily-notes.msg-no-next: Tiada nota harian untuk hari selepas ini.
daily-notes.option-new-file-location-description: Laluan folder untuk membuat nota harian.
daily-notes.option-template-description: Laluan fail yang akan digunakan sebagai templat.
daily-notes.option-open-on-start: Buka nota harian bila buka aplikasi
daily-notes.option-open-on-start-description: Buka nota harian secara automatik setiap kali anda membuka peti ini.

unique-note-creator.name: Unique note creator
unique-note-creator.desc: Create notes with unique timestamp prefixes, for workflows like zettelkasten or slip box.
unique-note-creator.option-new-file-location-description: The folder path to create the new unique note.
unique-note-creator.msg-folder-not-found: Failed to create unique note. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
unique-note-creator.option-template-file-description: The file path to use as template.
unique-note-creator.msg-template-file-not-found: Failed to create unique note. Template file "{{template}}" not found.
unique-note-creator.msg-failed-to-generate: Failed to generate a unique note with the format "{{format}}

random-note.name: Nota rawak
random-note.desc: Buka suatu nota rawak. Berguna untuk mengkaji dan menemui nota.

outline.name: Kerangka
outline.desc: Tunjukkan setiap pengepala sebagai kerangka untuk nota ini atau nota yang terpaut.

word-count.name: Jumlah kata
word-count.desc: Tunjukkan jumlah perkataan dalam jalur status.

slides.name: Slaid
slides.desc: Buat pembentangan guna Markdown. Gunakan "---" untuk pisahkan slaid.

audio-recorder.name: Perakam audio
audio-recorder.desc: Rakam audio dan simpan sebagai lampiran.
audio-recorder.msg-access-denied: Akses ke mikrofon dinafikan, tolong berikan akses melalui preference pane.
audio-recorder.msg-pending-grant: Tolong berikan akses ke mikrofon untuk merakam audio.

open-with-default-app.name: Buka dalam aplikasi lalai
open-with-default-app.desc: Tambah butang untuk membuka fail semasa dalam aplikasi lalai.

templates.name: Templat
templates.desc: Masukkan kandungan bertemplat yang diambil dari folder berisi fail-fail templat.
templates.option-template-folder-location-descript: Fail-fail dalam folder ini akan dijadikan templat.
templates.option-template-date-format-description: {{date}} dalam templat akan digantikan dengan nilai ini.
templates.option-template-date-format-description2: Anda juga boleh guna {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}} untuk memaksa format untuk templat terpilih.
templates.option-template-time-format-description: {{time}} dalam templat akan digantikan dengan nilai ini.
templates.option-template-time-format-description2: Anda juga boleh guna {{time:HH:mm}} untuk memaksa format untuk templat terpilih.
templates.msg-fail-invalid-folder: Gagal menemui senarai templat. Folder templat tidak sah.
templates.msg-fail-folder-not-found: Gagal menemui senarai templat. Folder "{{folderOption}}" tidak dijumpai.
templates.msg-fail-invalid-template-properties: Unable to insert template, the properties in the template file could not be read.
templates.msg-no-folder-set: Failed to list templates. No template folder configured.

translucency.name: Latar lut cahaya
translucency.desc: Hidupkan latar belakang lut cahaya untuk nampak berlapis-lapis. Disarankan dipasang bersama mod gelap. Tidak disokong dalam Linux.

slash-command.name: Slash commands
slash-command.desc: Enable the ability to trigger slash commands in the editor by typing the forward slash.

editor-status.name: Editor status
editor-status.desc: Display and change the current editor mode in the status bar.

publish.name: Publish
publish.label-no-internet-access: Anda perlu capaian internet untuk menerbitkan perubahan.
publish.label-publish-service-description: Obsidian Publish ialah perkhidmatan tambahan berbayar yang membolehkan anda menerbitkan nota dalam talian melalui Obsidian.
publish.label-please-login: Untuk mula menerbit, diminta daftar masuk atau buat akaun Obsidian baharu.
publish.label-no-publish-subscription: Anda belum lagi melanggan khidmat Obsidian Publish.
publish.label-delete-site-confirmation: Anda yakin anda ingin menghapuskan laman ini?
publish.label-delete-site-details: Perkara ini akan menghapuskan laman serta-merta buat selama-lamanya.
publish.option-site-id-description: Laman anda akan disiarkan di https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id}. Anda boleh mengubahnya kemudian. Hanya huruf kecil, nombor, dan sengkang sahaja dibenarkan.
publish.msg-invalid-site-id: ID laman hanya boleh ada huruf kecil, nombor dan sengkang.
publish.msg-site-id-in-use: ID laman ini sedang digunakan orang lain. Pilih ID yang lain.
publish.option-site-name-description: Nama laman yang anda terbitkan. Ini yang akan muncul sebagai tajuk laman anda.
publish.option-home-page-file-description: Halaman pertama yang akan dilihat oleh pelawat ketika sampai ke laman anda
publish.option-logo-description: Pilih fail gambar yang akan dijadikan logo laman anda.
publish.option-logo-placeholder: Mana-mana gambar yang dimuat naik dari peti...
publish.option-customize-navigation-desc: Override the order of navigation items and hide pages or folders from showing.
publish.option-hide-items-in-navigation: Hide pages or folders from navigation
publish.option-hide-items-in-navigation-desc: Right click and select "Hide" to prevent specific pages from appearing in the site navigation. The pages will still be accessible via links or accessing the URL directly.
publish.label-navigation-modal-desc: Drag and drop to customize the order in which navigation items appear on your Publish site.
publish.option-theme-description: Pilih tema warna untuk laman anda.
publish.option-show-theme-toggle-description: Let the visitor toggle between light and dark theme on their own.
publish.option-show-navigation-description: Tunjukkan senarai halaman yang sudah terbit di sebelah kiri laman.
publish.option-show-search-description: Tunjukkan jalur carian di bahagian atas navigasi yang membolehkan halaman dan pengepala-pengepalanya dicari oleh pelawat.
publish.option-show-graph-description: Tunjukkan graf tempatan yang kecil di setiap halaman.
publish.option-show-outline-description: Tunjukkan kerangka pengepala di setiap halaman.
publish.option-show-backlinks-description: Tunjukkan bahagian pautan balik di hujung setiap halaman.
publish.option-sliding-window-mode-description: Buka halaman baharu di hujung belah kanan dan boleh menggelungsur tetingkap ke kiri dan ke kanan.
publish.option-hover-preview-file-description: Paparkan pratontonan halaman bila penunjuk dihalakan ke pautan.
publish.option-hide-title-description: Hide the page title heading. Useful when you have your own headings at the beginning of each page.
publish.option-readable-line-length-description: Hadkan panjang baris maksimum. Tak banyak yang akan muat dalam skrin, tapi perenggan panjang lebih mudah dibaca.
publish.option-site-password-description: Hadkan akses ke laman menggunakan kata laluan.
publish.option-google-analytics-description: Gunakan Google Analytics untuk laman anda. Hanya boleh digunakan kalau anda gunakan domain URL sendiri. Disarankan ambil maklum berkaitan undang-undang tempatan terlebih dahulu.
publish.tooltip-add-linked: Tambah masuk semua fail yang dipautkan dari item yang dipilih
publish.msg-no-permission-to-publish-to-site: Anda tiada keizinan untuk terbit ke laman tersebut.
publish.label-clear-cache: Perubahan pada laman mengambil masa beberapa minit. Kalau anda tidak nampak perubahan terbaharu, cuba buang cache pelayar anda.
publish.label-visit-site: Laman anda boleh dilawati di sini:
publish.msg-something-went-wrong: Ada masalah timbul. Lihat konsol untuk maklumat lanjut.
publish.label-no-password: Laman anda tiada kata laluan. Sesiapa sahaja boleh melawatnya.
publish.label-have-password: Laman anda dikunci oleh kata laluan. Jika anda mempunyai banyak kata laluan, pelawat boleh masuk menggunakan mana-mana kata laluan tersebut.
publish.option-password-desc: Kata laluan dalam bentuk hash akan disimpan dengan selamat. Setelah kata laluan ditetapkan, ia tidak boleh didedahkan sebagai teks boleh dibaca.
publish.option-nickname-desc: Letak nama panggilan untuk ingatkan diri kata laluan itu untuk siapa.
publish.option-custom-domain-desc: Guna domain sendiri berbanding https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id} yang disediakan.
publish.option-noindex-desc: Mencegah enjin carian mengindeks laman anda.
publish.option-custom-url-redirect-desc: Bawa pelawat yang melawat publish.obsidian.md/id ke domain anda.
publish.label-custom-domain-instructions: Sila rujuk pautan bantuan kami di {{link}} untuk maklumat lanjut.
publish.label-sharing-with-users: This site is currently shared with the following people.
publish.label-not-sharing: This site is not currently shared with anyone.
publish.error-email-must-be-valid: Please enter a valid email to invite someone.
publish.msg-enable-publish-plugin: Please enable the Publish core plugin in Settings -> Core plugins to view sites.
publish.label-leave-site-confirmation-details: This will remove this site from the list of sites shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
publish.label-leave-site-confirmation-details-2: Please contact the owner of the site if you wish to collaborate on this site again.
publish.label-confirm-override-1: Are you sure you want to override the local version?
publish.label-confirm-override-2: The live version will be used and your local version will be discarded. Please make backups if necessary.
publish.message-successfully-used-live-version: Successfully used live version to override your local version.
publish.option-included-folders-desc: Files under these folders will automatically be selected when you review changes to publish.
publish.option-excluded-folders-desc: Files under these folders won't show up when you review changes to publish. This setting takes priority over included folders above.
publish.label-add-included-folder-desc: You can include both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.

workspaces.name: Tempat kerja
workspaces.desc: Simpan dan muat susun atur ruang tempat kerja.
workspaces.msg-enter-name: Please enter a name for the new layout.

sync.name: Sync
sync.desc: Segerakkan fail-fail anda melalui Obsidian Sync.
sync.msg-already-latest-version: Versi ini adalah sama dengan versi yang terkini.
sync.label-no-history: No sync history for this file.
sync.label-click-to-see-history: Tekan pada fail terhapus untuk lihat sejarahnya.
sync.label-remote-vault-explanation: Peti awan menyegerakkan peti-peti dari peranti berbeza secara selamat.
sync.option-vault-name-desc: Bantu anda mengingati tujuan peti ini dibuat.
sync.option-vault-region-desc: Select the server region closest to you to store the remote vault. This cannot be changed in the future.
sync.option-encryption-desc: End-to-end encryption offers the strongest security but requires you to safely store your encryption password. Standard encryption uses a key managed by Obsidian to protect your data in transit and on our servers.
sync.option-encryption-warning: This option cannot be changed later.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc: Kata laluan ini tidak boleh diubah kemudian.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc-warning: Jika anda lupa kata laluan ini, mana-mana data dalam awan tidak boleh digunakan selama-lamanya.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc-2: Perkara ini tidak memberi kesan pada data tempatan anda.
sync.label-encryption-password-explanation: The remote vault “{{name}}” is currently encrypted. Enter your password to unlock.
sync.label-rename-remote-vault-desc: Enter a new name for this remote vault.
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-questi: Anda yakin anda ingin menghapuskan peti awan ini?
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-result: Semua data dalam pelayan kami, termasuklah sejarah versi, akan dihapuskan. Data-data dalam komputer anda tidak disentuh.
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-warnin: Perbuatan ini akan kekal dan tidak boleh berpatah balik.
sync.msg-disconnect-from-deleted-vault: Obsidian Sync: The connected remote vault no longer exists.
sync.label-no-subscription: You don't have an active Obsidian Sync subscription.
sync.label-third-party-sync-warning-desc: Warning: Your vault seems to be using {{service}} as a third party sync service. If you use Obsidian Sync with this vault, you may run into conflicts, file corruption, or data loss.
sync.label-icloud-drive-warning: If you are using iCloud Drive, your Documents and Desktop folders might be synced by iCloud. This could cause conflicts with Obsidian Sync.
sync.option-remote-vault-desc-connected: Currently connected to the "{{name}}" remote vault.
sync.option-remote-vault-desc-not-connected: Currently not connected to any remote vault.
sync.option-device-name-desc: Nama ini akan ditunjukkan dalam log penyegerakan. Biarkan kosong untuk nama default.
sync.option-sync-log-desc: Lihat aktiviti terkini Sync untuk tujuan nyahpepijat.
sync.option-vault-size-unknown: Unable to retrieve your vault size.
sync.msg-largest-files-desc: Ini adalah fail-fail yang memakan paling banyak ruang. Setelah menghapuskan lampiran, tekan butang 'bersihkan' untuk kemaskan ruang peti awan.
sync.tooltip-purge-remote: Buang lampiran-lampiran yang terhapus dari peti awan untuk menjimatkan ruang.
sync.option-prevent-sleep-desc: Prevents the device from going to sleep when there are still files to be synced.
sync.option-excluded-folder-desc: Pilih mana folder yang ingin diabaikan oleh Obsidian Sync.
sync.option-sync-image-desc: Segerakkan fail-fail gambar dengan ekstension berikut: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-sync-audio-desc: Segerakkan fail-fail audio dengan ekstension berikut: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-sync-video-desc: Segerakkan fail-fail video dengan ekstension berikut: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-view-config-files-desc: View and restore version history of setting files.
sync.option-sync-app-desc: Enable to sync editor settings, files & links settings, etc.
sync.option-sync-appearance-desc: Sync appearance settings like dark mode, active theme, and enabled snippets.
sync.option-sync-appearance-data-desc: Sync downloaded themes and snippets. Whether they are enabled depends on the previous setting.
sync.option-sync-core-plugin-desc: Sync which core plugins are enabled.
sync.option-sync-community-plugin-desc: Sync which community plugins are enabled.
sync.option-sync-community-plugin-data-desc: Sync installed community plugins (.js, .css, and manifest.json files) and their settings.
sync.label-sync-introduction: Obsidian Sync ialah perkhidmatan tambahan berbayar untuk penyegrakan berserta penyulitan hujung-ke-hujung dan sejarah versi.
sync.label-account-required: Untuk mula menyegerak, sila daftar masuk atau buat akaun Obsidian baharu.
sync.label-add-excluded-folder-desc: You can exclude both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.
sync.label-connection-failed-desc: Failed to connect to remote vault.
sync.msg-vault-has-notes: Your local vault already contains some notes.
sync.msg-vault-merge-warning: If you connect to the remote vault "{{name}}", notes in your local vault will be merged with notes from your remote vault. In case of conflicts, the most recent version of the note will be preserved.
sync.tooltip-update-setting-on-all-devices: Please update this option and restart app on all the devices where you want it to take effect.
sync.label-sharing-with-users: This remote vault is currently shared with the following people.
sync.label-not-sharing: This remote vault is not currently shared with anyone.
sync.label-leave-vault-confirmation-details: This will remove this vault from the list of vaults shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
sync.label-leave-vault-confirmation-details-2: Please contact the owner of the vault if you wish to collaborate on this vault again.
sync.label-require-subscription-to-connect: You need an Obsidian Sync subscription to connect to this vault.
sync.option-contact-support-desc: If you run into any issues with Obsidian Sync, please contact us so we can help you out! You can reach us at support@obsidian.md.
sync.label-sync-disconnected: Sync is not connected to a remote vault.
sync.msg-remote-vault-limit-hit: Obsidian Sync lets you create up to 5 remote vaults. In order to create a new remote vault, please remove an existing one.
sync.label-upgrade-vault-encryption-desc: There is a new encryption version available for remote vaults.
sync.msg-recreate-remote-vault: This will delete your remote vault and recreate it with the latest encryption. Local files will not be affected, however your version history will be lost.
sync.msg-migrate-pre-confirmation-part1: To upgrade your encryption, all data in the vault will be re-uploaded to the Obsidian Sync servers using the new encryption method. This process will permanently delete all data encrypted with the old encryption, including the version history for your vault.
sync.msg-migrate-pre-confirmation-part2: Important: we strongly recommend creating a backup of your vault before proceeding to prevent any potential data loss.
sync.msg-migrate-pre-confirmation-part3: After completing the upgrade, you will need to reconnect all your devices to the updated remote vault.
sync.msg-migrate-confirmation: Migrating your vault may take some time. You will need to keep Obsidian active on this device to re-upload all your notes and attachments. It is best to do this on your primary device.
sync.msg-migrate-confirmation-size: You have {{size}} of data. Migrating your vault may take some time. You will need to keep Obsidian active on this device to re-upload all your notes and attachments. It is best to do this on your primary device.

file-recovery.name: Pemulihan fail
file-recovery.desc: Membolehkan anda mengembalikan snapshot-snapshot paling baharu untuk pulih dari kehilangan data yang tidak disengajakan. Snapshot hanya disimpan untuk fail Markdown.
file-recovery.option-interval-description: Sela masa paling pendek antara dua snapshot dalam minit.
file-recovery.option-keep-description: Sejauh mana snapshot akan disimpan dalam hari.
file-recovery.option-open-history-description: Lihat dan kembalikan snapshot yang disimpan.
file-recovery.label-clear-warning: Anda yakin ingin menghapuskan semua snapshot? Ambil maklum hanya snapshot sahaja yang akan dipadam. Semua fail dalam peti tidak disentuh.
file-recovery.label-select-file: Sila pilih fail dari sebelah kiri untuk lihat snapshot.

note-composer.name: Note composer
note-composer.option-split-replacement-text-descriptio: What to show in place of the selected text after extracting it.
note-composer.option-template-file-description: Template file to use when merging or extracting. Available variables: {{content}}, {{fromTitle}}, {{newTitle}}, {{date:FORMAT}}, e.g. {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}}.
note-composer.command-merge-file: Merge current file with another file...
note-composer.label-confirm-file-merge: Are you sure you want to merge "{{file}}" into "{{destination}}"? "{{file}}" will be deleted.
note-composer.msg-fail-to-fetch-template: Failed to fetch template file: "{{template}}" not found.

web-viewer.name: Web viewer
web-viewer.desc: Open external links to web pages inside Obsidian.
web-viewer.action-clear-data-cookies-desc: May sign you out of websites.
web-viewer.action-clear-data-all-desc: Removes all of the above as well as local storage and active sessions.
web-viewer.label-fail-to-load-desc: Please make sure you have the correct address.
web-viewer.option-open-external-links-desc: Open links in Obsidian rather than the system default.
web-viewer.option-homepage-desc: What page to view when a web viewer is opened
web-viewer.option-saved-markdown-desc: Websites saved as markdown will be placed here.
web-viewer.option-search-engine-desc: Search engine used when searching from the address bar.
web-viewer.option-search-engine-custom-desc: Use %s in place of the query.
web-viewer.option-enable-adblock-desc: If enabled, the filter lists below will be applied to all web viewer tabs.
web-viewer.option-adblock-lists-desc: One ad block list URL per line. Shared by all vaults.
web-viewer.option-adblock-frequency-desc: Days between updating filter lists. 0 indicates disabled. Shared by all vaults.
web-viewer.msg-error-finding-content: Unable to find content to extract.

canvas.name: Canvas
canvas.desc: Arrange and connect notes on an infinite canvas.
canvas.action-create-with-size: Create a card with specific size
canvas.action-drag-to-add-note: Drag to add note from vault
canvas.action-drag-to-add-media: Drag to add media from vault
canvas.label-export-png-desc: Export "{{title}}" as a PNG file with the settings below.
canvas.option-new-canvas-location: Default location for new canvas files
canvas.option-new-canvas-location-description: Where newly created canvas files are placed.
canvas.option-new-canvas-folder-path: Folder to create new canvas files in
canvas.option-new-canvas-folder-path-descriptio: Newly created canvas files will appear under this folder.
canvas.option-snap-to-grid-desc: Snap cards to the background grid when moving and resizing.
canvas.option-snap-to-objects-desc: Snap cards to nearby objects when moving and resizing.
canvas.option-zoom-breakpoint: Zoom threshold for hiding card content
canvas.option-zoom-breakpoint-desc: Lower values will increase performance but hide card content sooner when zooming out.
canvas.option-export-png-show-logo-desc: This will add an Obsidian logo to the bottom left.
canvas.option-export-png-privacy-mode-desc: This will obscure any text on your canvas.
canvas.option-export-png-zoom-desc: A higher zoom will generate a higher resolution image.
canvas.option-export-png-frame-desc: Choose to render the entire canvas or just the current visible viewport.
canvas.prompt-to-narrow: Type to find file, heading, or block
canvas.label-drag-from-below: Drag from below or double click
canvas.label-longpress: Touch and hold to add / move / select

pdf.action-reveal-in-outline: Reveal page in table of contents

properties.label-invalid-yaml-marker: Syntax error. Your frontmatter is invalid.
properties.label-migration-warning-desc: Are you sure you want to change the type? Some of the data associated with this property key is incompatible.
